examples: The children scarfed down the pizza at the birthday party.
Turn the mould upside down.
His parents are always breathing down his neck.
That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
A path led down the hill.
words.defineEn: feeling unhappy or dejected
words.defineVi: cảm thấy không vui hoặc chán nản

examples: Oh yeah, that was sad.
That's pretty sad if you ask me.
Sad, woe is us, to come to this plight!
She would cry at the drop of a hat when watching sad movies.
It would be humorous if it weren't so sad the way Sarah tiptoes around her wife.
words.defineEn: emotionally feeling bad
words.defineVi: cảm xúc tồi tệ

examples: Her father looked unhappy.
She left me with the impression that she was unhappy.
Elizabeth feels frustrated when people assume she's unhappy because she's on the shelf.
Believe me, the last thing I want is for you to be unhappy.
The man had everything he could ever want, but still felt unhappy and unfulfilled, realizing that a loveless life is living death.
words.defineEn: not happy; feeling sad
words.defineVi: không vui; cảm thấy buồn

examples: Is he upset?
My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
At first, I was upset when my ex cheated on me.
I'm not upset that vacation time might be reduced because I have no horse in this race.
He brewed a cup of ginger tea to soothe his upset stomach.
words.defineEn: unhappy, worried, or disappointed, often because something unpleasant happened
words.defineVi: không vui, lo lắng hoặc thất vọng, thường là vì điều gì đó khó chịu đã xảy ra

examples: I'm feeling a little depressed at the moment, but I'm sure good times are just around the corner.
A person with schizophrenia isn't necessarily depressed.
I am depressed.
I was depressed.
I was depressed.
words.defineEn: feeling very unhappy and having no hope
words.defineVi: cảm thấy rất buồn và không có hy vọng

examples: The plans for the new development have raised angry protests from local residents.
His angry glance said it all.
A hungry man is an angry man after all.
My grandmother got angry when I accidentally spilled juice on the carpet.
My boss was so angry that I really got the rough edge of his tongue.
words.defineEn: feeling very annoyed or upset because of something that we do not like
words.defineVi: cảm thấy rất khó chịu hoặc khó chịu vì điều gì đó mà chúng tôi không thích

examples: I'm excited about the next episode of my favorite TV show.
The children were excited to try the unusual-looking dragon fruit, an exotic accessory fruit.
The children were excited to learn about colors in art class.
We are excited to travel to our friend's wedding in another state.
She was excited to buy new clothes for the summer season.
words.defineEn: feeling very happy, interested, and energetic
words.defineVi: cảm thấy rất hạnh phúc, thích thú và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: I'm happy to get a little more bang for my bucks.
As they say, a happy heart is better than a full purse.
Since she moved to a smaller apartment, my mother is as happy as a flea in a doghouse!
With his new job and his new car, Andy is a happy camper.
After their break-up, she was happy to see the back of her ex-boyfriend.
words.defineEn: emotionally feeling good
words.defineVi: cảm xúc tốt

examples: My friend is afraid he might go down with the flu.
I’m afraid I’ll have to pass on that offer of coffee.
I'm afraid I have to disagree with your interpretation of the data.
I was afraid he was going to hit me.
I'm afraid I'm a bad dancer.
words.defineEn: getting a bad and anxious feeling from a person or thing because we think something bad or dangerous will happen
words.defineVi: nhận được một cảm giác tồi tệ và lo lắng từ một người hoặc một vật bởi vì chúng tôi nghĩ điều gì đó tồi tệ hoặc nguy hiểm sẽ xảy ra

examples: I'm sick of your foolishness.
I'm sick of your foolishness.
You get sick to the back teeth with it.
I am sick to death of hearing your excuses.
He was sick of being the butt of their jokes.
words.defineEn: not in a good and healthy physical or mental state
words.defineVi: không ở trạng thái thể chất hoặc tinh thần tốt và khỏe mạnh

examples: I'm tired of your playing fast and loose with me.
People will get tired of listening to him!
We're tired of hearing it!
I'm tired of working in this thankless IT support job.
I got tired of starting from square one again, man.
words.defineEn: needing to sleep or rest because of not having any more energy
words.defineVi: cần ngủ hoặc nghỉ ngơi vì không còn năng lượng

examples: People will also simply get bored.
I was bored.
I was bored.
- I'm bored.
I'm bored.
words.defineEn: tired and unhappy because there is nothing to do or because we are no longer interested in something
words.defineVi: mệt mỏi và không vui vì không có gì để làm hoặc vì chúng ta không còn hứng thú với điều gì đó

examples: To go crazy/mad/nuts/insane.
It’s crazy to make these changes without involving the students.
Her infectious laughter and radiant smile made him crazy.
It drives me crazy seeing all these people just staring at their phones all day long.
Would you stop shouting, you're driving me crazy!
words.defineEn: behaving in a very strange or unusual way
words.defineVi: cư xử theo một cách rất kỳ lạ hoặc bất thường

examples: You've been complaining all day.
He complained of being kept out of the loop and threatened to resign.
The procrastinator complained about not having enough time to pursue their hobbies, but idle folk have the least leisure, and their lack of productivity left them with little free time.
When the teacher complained about the boys' rowdy behavior, the principal dismissed it by saying that boys will be boys.
She was getting sick of hearing him complain.
words.defineEn: to express one's annoyance, unhappiness, or dissatisfaction about something
words.defineVi: để bày tỏ sự khó chịu, bất hạnh, hoặc không hài lòng của một người về một cái gì đó

examples: My wife talked sense into me.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The two men talked.
A true leader walks the talk.
He talked a blue streak all through breakfast.
words.defineEn: to tell someone about the information, feelings, or ideas that we have
words.defineVi: để nói với ai đó về thông tin, cảm xúc hoặc ý tưởng mà chúng tôi có

examples: Don't worry.
They worried about an FBI fishing expedition.
Don’t worry.
Don't worry about it.
Don't worry about him.
words.defineEn: to feel upset and nervous because we think about bad things that might happen to us or our problems
words.defineVi: cảm thấy khó chịu và lo lắng vì chúng tôi nghĩ về những điều tồi tệ có thể xảy ra với chúng tôi hoặc các vấn đề của chúng tôi

words.defineEn: to consider the advantages, disadvantages, and probability of an action
words.defineVi: để xem xét những lợi thế, bất lợi, và xác suất của một hành động

examples: Apologize for what?
I apologize if I did so.
If I were in her place, I would have at least apologized.
She apologized for her mistake, and I accepted it.
The coach fell on his sword apologizing for the team's poor season.
words.defineEn: to tell a person that one is sorry for having done something wrong
words.defineVi: để nói với một người rằng một người xin lỗi vì đã làm điều gì đó sai

examples: The superintendent believed Lancaster's story.
I believed his lies for years.
Scientists believe that a major breakthrough is on the horizon.
Many sports pundits believe the vultures are circling for the team's beleaguered head coach.
His opponents believe he is definitely on the run.
words.defineEn: to accept something to be true even without proof
words.defineVi: để chấp nhận một cái gì đó là sự thật ngay cả khi không có bằng chứng

examples: The boat hit against an object under the surface of the water.
My cousin objected and he was not a minority of one.
Workers scrambled to carry priceless objects out of harm's way.
She stepped on a sharp object and hurt her foot.
The metal rod began to bend under the weight of the heavy object.
words.defineEn: to express opposition, disagreement, or disapproval
words.defineVi: để thể hiện sự phản đối, bất đồng, hoặc không tán thành

words.defineEn: used to inquire information about someone or something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hỏi thông tin về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: used for making a suggestion
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đưa ra một đề nghị
